The popularity and specification of the language pair (Persian-English)

The language pair of Persian and English is not famous, and that is why it is a real challenge to find reliable and qualified specialists or services that help to make a translation and dub. But if we talk about both of these languages separately, it gives you a clear picture.

Without any doubt, English is the most popular and spoken language on the entire Earth. Over 1.5 billion people can communicate while using this language, and among this number, 400+ million are native speakers. Since so many people know the language, there are 162 different dialects of it, which is one of the well-known complexities of the video translation.

Persian is a language used mainly by the citizens of Afghanistan, Iran, and Tajikistan. The approximate number of speakers of this language is around 110 million people. The primary complexity of this language (in terms of translation) is the language ambiguities, processing idioms, and slang.

And there are not so many specialists (video and voice translators) who are capable of dealing with this language pair. That is why it is worth trying to use the services of the online video translator VidBy, which is your problem-solver.
